text.section: In order to provide for full and fair disclosure in the sale of Medicare supplement policies, a Medicare supplement policy or certificate may not be delivered in the State unless an outline of coverage is provided to the applicant at the time the application is delivered.

section.section: In this subsection, "format" means style, arrangements, and overall appearance, including the size, color, and prominence of type and arrangement of text and captions.
The Commissioner shall prescribe the format and content of the outline of coverage required by this section.
